briefdescription.para: Constructs a container for the points allocated on the host.

parameterdescription.para: The queue to use for memory allocation
The number of points to allocate

briefdescription.para: Constructs a container for the points allocated on the host using a pre-allocated buffers.

parameterdescription.para: The queue to use for memory allocation
The number of points
The pre-allocated buffer to use for the points data

memberdef.argsstring: (TQueue &queue, int32_t n_points, std::span< element_type > input, std::span< int > output)
memberdef.name: PointsHost

briefdescription.para: Constructs a container for the points allocated on the host using interleaved data.

parameterdescription.para: The queue to use for memory allocation
The number of points
The pre-allocated buffer containing interleaved coordinates and weights
The pre-allocated buffer to store the cluster indexes

simplesect.para: The input buffer must contain the coordinates and weights in an SoA format

memberdef.argsstring: (TQueue &queue, int32_t n_points, std::span< element_type > coordinates, std::span< element_type > weights, std::span< int > output)
memberdef.name: PointsHost

briefdescription.para: Constructs a container for the points allocated on the host using separate coordinate and weight buffers.

parameterdescription.para: The queue to use for memory allocation
The number of points
The pre-allocated buffer containing the coordinates
The pre-allocated buffer containing the weights
The pre-allocated buffer to store the cluster indexes

simplesect.para: The coordinates buffer must have a size of n_points * Ndim

briefdescription.para: Constructs a container for the points allocated on the host using multiple pre-allocated buffers.

parameterdescription.para: The queue to use for memory allocation
The number of points
The pre-allocated buffers to use for the points data

briefdescription.para: Constructs a container for the points allocated on the host using interleaved data.

briefdescription.para: Returns the number of points.

simplesect.para: The number of points

briefdescription.para: Returns the coordinates of the points for a specific dimension as a const span.

parameterdescription.para: The dimension for which to get the coordinates

simplesect.para: A const span of the coordinates for the specified dimension

briefdescription.para: Returns the coordinates of the points for a specific dimension as a span.

parameterdescription.para: The dimension for which to get the coordinates

simplesect.para: A span of the coordinates for the specified dimension

briefdescription.para: Returns the weights of the points as a const span.

briefdescription.para: Returns the weights of the points as a span.

simplesect.para: A span of the weights of the points

briefdescription.para: Returns the cluster indexes of the points as a const span.

simplesect.para: A const span of the cluster indexes of the points

briefdescription.para: Indicates whether the points have been clustered.

simplesect.para: True if the points have been clustered, false otherwise

memberdef.name: view

briefdescription.para: Returns the view of the points.

simplesect.para: A const reference to the PointsView structure containing the points data

briefdescription.para: Returns the view of the points.

simplesect.para: A reference to the PointsView structure containing the points data

briefdescription.para: Returns the Point object at the specified index.

parameterdescription.para: The index of the point to retrieve

simplesect.para: The Point object at the specified index

briefdescription.para: Teturns the cluster properties of the points.

simplesect.para: The number of clusters reconstructed
This value is lazily evaluated and cached upon the first call

briefdescription.para: Returns the associator mapping clusters to their associated points.

simplesect.para: An host_associator mapping clusters to points
This object is lazily evaluated and cached upon the first call

briefdescription.para: Returns a vector containing the sizes of each cluster.

simplesect.para: A vector of containing the sizes of each cluster
This vector is lazily evaluated and cached upon the first call

briefdescription.para: Returns the ClusterProperties object containing the properties of the clusters.

simplesect.para: The ClusterProperties object
This object is lazily evaluated and cached upon the first call

briefdescription.para: The PointsHost class is a data structure that manages points in host memory. It provides methods to allocate, access, and manipulate points in host memory.

parameterdescription.para: The number of dimensions of the points to manage
The data type for the point coordinates and weights
